description: Analyzes tasks provided by the user — suggests priority levels, estimates time, breaks complex tasks into subtasks, provides workload balancing advice, and delivers productivity insights through conversational interaction.

result.analysis_type: Type of analysis: task_analysis, priority_suggestion, subtask_breakdown, workload_review, productivity_insight, or general
result.message: The main response message in plain text

tasks.priority: Priority level: urgent, high, medium, or low

workload_summary.estimated_total_time: Total estimated time for all tasks
workload_summary.balance_status: Workload balance: overloaded, balanced, or light
